name: Gates Industrial Corporation plc
description: Gates Industrial Corporation plc is a global leader in power transmission and fluid power solutions, dedicated to providing innovative products and services that enhance the performance of machinery and equipment. Founded in 1911, Gates has a rich history of engineering excellence and a commitment to quality, making it a trusted partner in various industries, including automotive, industrial, and aerospace. The company specializes in the design and manufacture of a wide range of belts, hoses, and other related components, which are crucial for the functionality and efficiency of engines and machinery. Gates is recognized for its advanced technologies, such as the PowerGrip® and MegaSys® product lines, which offer superior performance and durability. With a strong focus on sustainability, Gates aims to reduce energy consumption and emissions through its innovative solutions. The company operates in multiple regions worldwide, ensuring that it meets the diverse needs of its customers. Gates is committed to continuous improvement and innovation, investing heavily in research and development to stay at the forefront of the industry. Its mission is to provide high-quality, reliable products that enable customers to achieve greater efficiency and productivity in their operations.
